title: Men's Classic Leather Oxford Shoes
description: The Men's Classic Leather Oxford Shoes in Black, size 10, by Elegant Steps are perfect for any formal occasion. Made from high-quality leather, these shoes feature a sleek Oxford design with a polished finish. The cushioned insole ensures comfort, while the durable outsole provides long-lasting wear. Handmade in Italy, these shoes offer superior craftsmanship and style. Ideal for business meetings, weddings, and other formal events, they add a touch of elegance to any outfit.
meta_description: Buy Men's Classic Leather Oxford Shoes in Black, size 10. High-quality leather, cushioned insole, and durable outsole. Perfect for formal occasions.
